title: Gorgeous Studio in Lincoln park
posting_body: Gorgeous top-floor studio in prime Lincoln Park/Park West.
Plenty of room for a queen bed, small couch or loveseat, desk, and more.
HUGE mirror-door closet and additional coat closet.
Studio has a renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, built-in microwave, dishwasher, granite counters and a kitchen island.
Bathroom has a soaking tub and new shower head.
Large, East-facing windows give beautiful morning light, but apartment is bright all day.
Card operated laundry, bike room, elevator in the building.
Live-in building manager available 24/7 for any needs, keeps the building in tip-top shape.
All utilities except wifi included in rent.
Within 10 min walking distance to Fullerton brown line stop,Trader Joes, Target, Collectivo Coffee, Equinox, and tons of great bars and restaurants on Clark and Lincoln.
Looking for a September 1st move-in to take over my lease through May 31st.
I love love love the apartment, would not be leaving except for a job relocation to NYC.
Please contact me via email or text if you're interested!
